<script engine="kscript">

      var block  = k.site.htmlBlocks.get("blockname");
      
      var label = k.site.labels.get("labelkey");  

    </script>

Method.Name: all
Method.Description: Return an array of the SiteObjects

Method.Name: get
Method.Description: Get an item based on Name or Id

Method.Name: update
Method.Example:
<script engine="kscript">
     
   var label = k.site.labels.get("key"); 
   label.value = "new label value"; 
   k.site.labels.update(label);
    
</script>

Method.Name: add
Method.Example:
<script engine="kscript">
  var block = {};
  block.name = "blockname";
  block.value = "new  body";
  k.site.htmlBlocks.add(block);
</script>
